p: The antidiabetic effect of C. colocynthis extract could be linked to the plant’s ability to stimulate the β-cells, to activate the insulin receptors, to decrease gluconeogenesis, to inhibit the release of counter-regulatory hormones, to inhibit the effect of glucose absorption, to increase the incorporation of circulating glucose as hepatic glycogen, and to partially regenerate or preserve the pancreatic β-cell mass [ 204, 207].
